This action searches Salesforce Knowledge articles to find relevant information.

Backend Configuration

  • defaultLanguage (String): Default language for search (e.g., "en_US")
  • maxResults (Number): Maximum articles to return (default: 5)

Parameters (AI will provide)

  • searchQuery (String): Keywords or question to search for
  • articleId (String): Specific article ID to retrieve directly (optional)
